Helping to create and improve digital products

A Pitch Deck for Rivlelin Co

We have a combined experience of over 20 years working with charities, start-ups, tech agencies and creative studios, helping them to create and improve both digital and physical products.

Hillsborough based

Newly moved to Hillsborough, our freshly formed creative studio is bursting with energy and eagerness to get stuck into such a creative local project. With Hannah's design background and Richard's dedication to functional web development, we are the perfect team for your project. 

What to expect from Orva

Creative Design

Seamlessly navigate through visually appealing and easy-to-use interfaces with gorgeous illustrations and design.

Custom Development

Hand-made websites built to meet the unique needs of every business. Because we don't use templates or plugins any feature you request is possible.

Easy Communication

We will give you regular updates of our progress with the opportunity to change the direction of the project to your liking. So the end result will be exactly what you're expecting.

Design Process

Basic overview of how we work:

Understand

Ask the right questions. Understand requirements. Define use cases.

Research

Analyse competitors. Reach out to users. Keep an eye on guidelines.

Sketch

Gather ideas. Sketch out user flow. Present ideas, evaluate and re-draw.

Design

Create polished illustrations. Create prototypes. Test with users.

Implement

Pull together all elements. Build experience. Make it beautiful.

Happy client

Satisfied clients. Building long-lasting relationships. Available for maintenance.

Our pricing

Orva is a shiny new creative agency with a mission to offer high-quality services without the heavy price tag. Were a two-person team operating on lean principles which means we focus on what mattersthe value we bring to our customers, like you. Were all about stripping back the fluff and cutting out unnecessary fuss that only serves to eat up your time and money.

Examples of Previous Work

Nacro website
GOV.UK eApostille
CYB website

Nacro Website - illustrations only

We were tasked to produce a range of illustrations for Nacro, both for web and print. These illustrations show people navigating life outside of prison and the services Nacro offers to help change lives. They have been used in many different resources. We have also illustrated several other projects over the years for Nacro, and are happy to share images of these different styles if you would like to see more examples.

Document Legalisation - dev only

This is a project that was created with a team of others but the development of just the eApostille service was our responsibility. The brief was to build a digital version of the paper-based product. This included an accessible document upload service, virus scanning of the documents and creating a way for users to keep track of what they uploaded.

Caution Your Blast - development only

This project was created with a team of others but the development of the scaffolding of the site and the insights page was our responsibility. This involved fetching and displaying data from a CMS (Contentful), and creating a way to search for posts by title and tags. And displaying the text information form each post.
